org.chronos.chronograph.internal.impl.index

Class AbstractRecordPropertyIndexer2<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.chronos.chronograph.internal.impl.index.AbstractRecordPropertyIndexer2<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of values produced by this indexer.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.chronos.chronodb.api.indexing.Indexer<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EdgeRecordPropertyIndexer2, VertexRecordPropertyIndexer2

    @PersistentClass(value="kryo")
public abstract class AbstractRecordPropertyIndexer2<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.chronos.chronodb.api.indexing.Indexer<T>
    A base class for all indexers working on ElementRecords.
